page.title: 18THORWALD GARAGE
page.content: Mr.Allan has been a{mechanic}for 15 years. He has owned his{garage}in Cross for 2 years. Before that he worked at{Kettletoft Pier}& worked on {diggers.}At{Thorwald}he has all the equipment necessary to{repair all {types of cars.}He has{drills, welding {rods, a tyre change, a compressor}(for putting air into tyres, spray painting, etc.),{spanners}& other{hand {tools.}He has a{lift}which is invaluable for{examining & repairing the{under parts of cars.}He{does not {have an assistant}& still manages to get through{5-6 cars}in a{week. However he enjoys mending{tractors most & has a{good stock of spares}for cars & tractors. He will get{spares from{Kirkwall}when asked, such as {batteries, tyres & exhausts.}He also has a{digger}which he{hires out}to {farmers}or the{County workmen.
